CustomField.formula: OR( PreApplication__r.HideOwnerEdit__c , IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Program Reviewer'), ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Fiscal Reviewer'), ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Executive Reviewer') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Assigned')), False ) )
CustomField.label: Hide Grantee Pre App Btn
